headline: Ciena Stock Gains 43% in 3 Months: Should Investors Buy or Hold Now?
summary: CIEN shares are up 42.6% in three months as AI-driven bandwidth demand, a $5B backlog and a raised 2026 outlook fuel the rally despite a premium valuation.

raw.headline: Ciena Stock Gains 43% in 3 Months: Should Investors Buy or Hold Now?
raw.summary: CIEN shares are up 42.6% in three months as AI-driven bandwidth demand, a $5B backlog and a raised 2026 outlook fuel the rally despite a premium valuation.

headline: CIEN Acquires Nubis: How it Turns Buyouts Into Competitive Advantage
summary: Ciena buys Nubis for $270 million to boost AI-ready data center interconnects, aiming for faster, efficient and scalable connectivity.

headline: Earnings Preview: What to Expect From Arista Networks’ Report
summary: Arista Networks is gearing up to report its fourth-quarter results in the coming month, with Wall Street expecting earnings to climb by more than 10%.
